# Preliminaries

## Load packages

```{r setup, message = FALSE, warning = FALSE}
here::i_am("rnng_rt.Rmd")
library(here)
library(tidyverse) # for data processing
library(knitr)
library(lmerTest)
library(mgcv)
```

```{r}
df_rtsurp <- filter(read_csv(here("data/final.csv")), RT > 0)
```

```{r}

p_rtsurp <- ggplot(
 df_rtsurp,
  aes(y = log(RT), x = ind)
) +
  geom_point(
    stat = "identity"
  ) +
  geom_smooth(method = lm, level = 0.99) +
  ggtitle("title")
p_rtsurp

```

```{r}
output <- lmer(RT ~ lstm + ind + (1|WorkerId), data=df_rtsurp)
summary(output)
```

```{r}
gam_y <- gam(log(RT) ~ lstm + ind, method = "ML", data=df_rtsurp)
summary(gam_y)
```
